Author: kawaii_dreams
Text: it's completely normal to lose approximately 100 hairs a day, it will look like more if you have long hair. it will especially look like more if you don't brush or wash your hair more than once a week. you only need to start worrying about alopecia if you start getting bald patches, and even then it could just be nutritional deficiencies and it's just your hair thinning

Author: princess-kitty-belle
Text: I have hairloss from periods of restriction and my hairdresser has assured me it's not alopecia, more to do with nutritional deficiencies and stress. Even if you are eating well, it can take around three months for your hair to catch up with the rest of your body.
